title.rendered: Part Time Front Office | Tulsa, OK

content.rendered:
Part Time Front Office |Tulsa, Oklahoma

  • Part-Time, Monday, Thursday, Friday 8am-5pm
  • Responsible for greeting patients, answering phones, making appointments, taking co-pays, scanning, and other front office duties
  • Must be able to work well as part of a team
  • Prefer 1+ years of medical office experience preferred
  • Must have EMR experience and reception or front office skills required
  • $11-$12/hour
